videos.title: 🤔 What is Zero Value in Golang? | Go Interview Prep #shorts
videos.description:
📌 Learn about the concept of **Zero Value** in Golang - a common interview question!

✅ Go automatically assigns a default (zero) value to every variable
✅ Helps avoid undefined or garbage values
✅ Promotes code safety, readability, and bug prevention
✅ Ideal for structs, arrays, and large-scale apps

🎯 Perfect for beginners & interview preparation!

📚 Topics Covered:
- Go Zero Value Explained
- Why it's useful in production code
- Interview tip for Golang developers

📅 Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe!

#golang #goprogramming #interviewquestions #codingtips #learnprogramming #godeveloper #shorts
videos.playlistName: Golang Interview Shorts | 1 Go Qn a Day | Crack Interviews Fast

videos.title: 🛡️ Why Zero Value in Go is a Game-Changer! | Golang Tips #shorts
videos.description:
🔍 Discover why the **Zero Value** concept in Go matters!

💡 Key Benefits:
- Prevents bugs from uninitialized variables
- Guarantees safe default states
- Encourages clean, readable code
- Aligns with Go’s simplicity and safety philosophy
- Critical for large apps & structs

🔥 Boost your Go interview answers with this core concept!

📚 Ideal for:
- New Go developers
- Job interview prep
- Clean coding advocates

📌 Like, Share & Subscribe for more Golang Tips!

#golangtips #gointerviewprep #cleanCode #zeroValue #golanginterview #learnGo #developerlife #shorts

videos.title: 🧱 Zero Value in Structs in Go Explained! | Golang Interview Prep #shorts
videos.description:
📘 Ever wondered what happens to a struct in Go when you don't initialize its fields?

✨ In this video, we explain **Zero Value in Structs** - a key Golang concept and a common interview question!

🧩 What you'll learn:
- How struct fields are assigned zero values by default
- Why this makes Go safer and bug-free
- How it helps write cleaner, reliable code

🔑 Interview Tip: Be ready to explain this behavior in Go!

📌 Like, share & subscribe for more Golang insights!

#golang #golanginterview #zerovalue #gostructs #golangshorts #interviewprep #codingtips #shorts

videos.title: 🧠 GoLang Quiz: What’s the Zero Value of `bool`? 🤔 #Shorts
videos.description:
🚀 Test your GoLang skills in 30 seconds!

🧐 Question: What is the zero value of a `bool` variable in Go?

Options:
A. true
B. false ✅
C. 0
D. nil

Perfect for:
✅ Go developers
✅ Interview prep
✅ Daily coding challenge

👉 Drop your answer in the comments!

videos.title: 💭 GoLang: What Does `fmt.Println(s)` Print? 🤯 #Shorts
videos.description:
🧪 Quick GoLang Interview Challenge!

🤔 What will be printed?
```go
var s string
fmt.Println(s)
```
Options:
A. nil
B. empty string ✅
C. undefined
D. error

🧠 Think you know the answer? Comment below!

videos.title: 🌀 GoLang Slice Mystery: Is `nums == nil` True? 🤨 #Shorts
videos.description:
📌 Slice Comparison in GoLang:

🤔 What will be printed?
```go
var nums []int
fmt.Println(nums == nil)
```
Options:
A. true ✅
B. false
C. error
D. []

🧠 Test your interview skills in 30 seconds!

#golang #slicenil #gointerview #programming #shorts #developerlife
